verbose_text: Other methoxy derivatives (nepetin, chrysoeriol, hispidulin, pectolinarigenin) were detected in the aerial part in the amount of 8.0 mg/4.4 kg dry raw material (nepetin), 3.5 mg/4.4 kg dry raw material (hispidulin), as well as in leaves and 1.6 mg/215 g dry weight (pectolinarigenin) and flowers (chrysoeriol) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
